name: Touchy Subjects
description:
An old game from 2014, uploaded as a humorous preamble to #ResistJam.

 

Weapons of mass destruction? Adjust that tie! Labor Laws? Wipe that brow! Women's Rights? Throw up the air quotes!
Step inside a politician simulator and experience the feeling of avoiding important political (and sometimes non political) issues, just like the pros! If things get too intense, you better “Make It Rain" and throw cash in the voters' faces to win that high approval rating.
